headline: Is Citigroup's (C) Preferred Redemption Quietly Rewiring Its Capital Strategy for a Fees-First Future?
summary: In early February 2026, Citigroup raised a series of senior unsecured notes and preferred Depositary Shares totaling more than US$1.07 billion, while also announcing the full redemption of US$2.30 billion in Series X preferred stock as part of a broader capital and funding reconfiguration. Alongside record 2025 Services revenue and heavy investment in technology and AI, these funding moves suggest Citigroup is actively reshaping its balance sheet mix toward more efficient, fee-rich and...
